p: While working with the essential oil of C. cajucara, the red variety, and corroborating with the result found for C. albicans in this study, Azevedo ( 2010) verified the absence of antifungal activity against C. albicans. Likewise, LÃ³pez ( 2010) did not find antifungal activity against C. albicans when analyzing the brute methanol extract of the leaves and bark of Croton urucurana Baill. by using the agar well method.
